title.value: Увеличение урожайности зерна и окупаемости минеральных удобрений при возделывании озимой ржи за счет использования регуляторов роста и микроэлементов
Increase in the productivity of grain and payback of mineral fertilizers during cultivation of winter rye due to the use of growth regulators and microelements

journal.title: Bulletin of the Belarussian State Agricultural Academy : the guidance journal

person.name: Tsyganov, A.R., Belarusian National Technical University, Minsk (Belarus)
Tsyganova, A.A., Belarus State Academy of Agriculture, Gorki (Belarus)

abstract.value: Application of multi-component preparation 'Mikom' in the conditions of Gorki district on average during 2003–2005 led to the productivity of winter rye grain of 5.20 t/ha and the indicator of payback of 1 kg of NPK – 9.7 kg of grain. Growth regulators agrostimulin and emistim C ensured increase in grain productivity of 0.25 and 0.34 t/ha. Payback of 1 kg of NPK increased up to 8.8 and 9.2 kg of grain with the application of agrostimulin and emistim. In the conditions of Smolevichi district on average during 2006-2008, maximal yield of winter rye grain (8.67 t/ha) was obtained with the application of N30P60K90 + N50 + 'Mikom'. Growth regulators epin extra and megafol ensured the increase in grain yield of 0.36 t/ha and 0.53 t/ha correspondingly. In these variants of the test we observed greater payback of 1 kg of NPK – 12.3 kg, 10.9 kg and 10.6 kg of grain correspondingly. On average during 2010–2012 in the conditions of 'Experimental fields of Belarusian State Agricultural Academy', the highest increase in grain yield was obtained due to the treatment of plants of winter rye with moddus (+0.50 t/ha); maximal yield in the test was 5.77 t/ha. Combined application of Adob-Cu and Adob-Mn increased the yield of winter rye grain by 0.29 t/ha and the payback of 1 kg of NPK by 1.1 kg of grain.
